channel.title: Edus on Turku Data Science Group
channel.description: Recent content in Edus on Turku Data Science Group

item.title: EDU
item.description: Courses and events Topics for MSc/PhD theses Welcome to contact us to discuss research/study positions. We supervise study assignments (BSc/MSc/PhD) on applied statistics / computational science / machine learning / AI theory, methods, and their application to study complex natural and social systems. Active research projects cover scientific data analysis, statistical and probabilistic programming workflows, data visualization, microbial metagenomics, ecological and evolutionary models, multi-omic data integration, spatio-temporal models, computational history, and open government data analysis.

item.title: EDU
item.description: Resources Tutorials and Data Microbiome data science Microbiome data science with R/Bioconductor (beta version) R tutorial for phyloseq Open government data analytics Various R tutorials Data visualization Finnish geospatial data visualization in R Teaching software & online resources A framework for creating and assessing exercises for R courses (presented in UseR2017!; Markus Kainu) Open access to educational resources National policy and executive plan by the higher education and research community for 2021-2025 (2020) DOI:10.
